welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Piastow, a charming city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our beautiful streets, taste our delicious cuisine, and immerse yourself in the local culture. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Frederic Chopin Airport, mainly used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but users must watch a short advertisement before connecting.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warsaw Babice Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warsaw Babice Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
